title: Web-Notion
content:
Web-notion is an express-handlebar based server that uses Notion as a database to source web content.

GitHub

Get Started

  1. Clone the repository
  2. Configure notion.config.js
  3. Design your site in HBS under /views

Page Context

Each page gets a dictionary of context values from the notion page it is based on.

Production

Web-notion can be hosted with a back-end that recognizes updates to the notion database. It can also be hosted statically where it remains with the content that was fetched during the build stage (this website is one such example).
